x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying circlex-locations relative to center

y.description: A numeric vector, unit object, or a character vectorof values containing a "b" combined with a numeric valuespecifying circle y-locations relative to center

r.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying radii

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{r}, \code{x}, or \code{y} are only given as numerics ornumeric vectors

linecolor.description: A character value specifying circle line color

lwd.description: A numeric specifying circle line width

lty.description: A numeric specifying circle line type

fill.description: A character value specifying circle fill color

alpha.description: A numeric value specifying color transparency

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
